protective_factors: Identifies family/dependents as a strong inhibitor against acting on thoughts ('I couldn't do that to them')
Absence of past attempts or preparatory behaviors (Confirmed via Triage Agent context)
Compliance with current treatment plan and willingness to try dose increase
risk_factors: Current passive suicidal ideation (Wish to disappear)
Significant functional impairment (Missed three days of work)
Pronounced feelings of guilt and burden ('I'm letting everyone down')
Current lack of response to *Sertraline* (50mg) after 4 weeks
clinical_actions: Maintain high level of monitoring due to severe depressive episode (F33.1, Moderate)
Revisit safety assessment closely following *Sertraline* dose increase
Reinforce protective factors and external reasons for living (family)
